response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. It's not just an item; it's a statement of excellence and functionality. Given its unique features and the care put into its creation, I believe this product is worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth and the value it could bring to you, I am extending an exclusive offer of $12,000 for it. This is an opportunity to own something truly special at a price that reflects its superior quality and potential impact on your life. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
